mapper.select: insert into user( uid , displayname , email , bannerId , phoneNumber , photoUrl , providerId , tokenGoogle ) values( #{uid} , #{displayname} , #{email} , #{bannerId} , #{phoneNumber} , #{photoUrl} , #{providerId} , #{tokenGoogle})
insert into mainbanneritem ( adId, bannerId, imgUrl, itemClickUrl ) values( #{adId} , #{bannerId} , #{imgUrl} , #{itemClickUrl} )

insert into shops ( shopId , addInfoAsPhone , addInfoCeo , addInfoChangePay , addInfoEmail , addInfoInternetConfirmNumber , addInfoTranAutoType , addInfoTranCustomerCode , addInfoTranName , addInfoTransAddNumber , addInfoTransRecallAdd , addInfoWorkingTime , basicAgeType , basicStyle , basicTitleWord , shopCountItemClick , shopCountLike , shopHomepage , shopMainImg , shopName )
values( #{shopId}, #{addInfoAsPhone}, #{addInfoCeo}, #{addInfoChangePay}, #{addInfoEmail}, #{addInfoInternetConfirmNumber}, #{addInfoTranAutoType}, #{addInfoTranCustomerCode}, #{addInfoTranName}, #{addInfoTransAddNumber}, #{addInfoTransRecallAdd}, #{addInfoWorkingTime}, #{basicAgeType}, #{basicStyle}, #{basicTitleWord}, #{shopCountItemClick}, #{shopCountLike}, #{shopHomepage}, #{shopMainImg}, #{shopName} )

insert into item ( shopId, shopItemDetailUrl, shopItemName, shopItemPriceOriginal, shopItemPriceSale, shopItemUrl, shopTitle, itemId ) values( #{shopId} , #{shopItemDetailUrl} , #{shopItemName} , #{shopItemPriceOriginal} , #{shopItemPriceSale} , #{shopItemUrl} , #{shopTitle} , #{itemId} )

insert into shopItemDetailArray ( itemId , detailItemCategori , detailItemColor , detailItemImg , detailItemImgThum , detailItemShop_fee , detailItemSize , detailItemTitle , detailPagesItem , shopItemDetailUrl , shopItemName , shopItemPriceOriginal , shopItemPriceSale , shopItemUrl ) values( #{itemId} , #{detailItemCategori} , #{detailItemColor} , #{detailItemImg} , #{detailItemImgThum} , #{detailItemShop_fee} , #{detailItemSize} , #{detailItemTitle} , #{detailPagesItem} , #{shopItemDetailUrl} , #{shopItemName} , #{shopItemPriceOriginal} , #{shopItemPriceSale} , #{shopItemUrl} )

insert into event ( eventId , clickCount , endDate , eventContent , imgUrlContent , imgUrlMain , startDate ) values( #{eventId}, #{clickCount}, #{endDate}, #{eventContent}, #{imgUrlContent}, #{imgUrlMain}, #{startDate} )

insert into tbscore ( itemId , shopId , itemClick , itemLike , shopLiike , itemShare , shopShare , shopClick ) values( #{itemId} , #{shopId} , #{itemClick} , #{itemLike} , #{shopLiike} , #{itemShare} , #{shopShare} , #{shopClick} )
